Content.Title: 1Xtra New Year Mix: Rampage
Content.Synopsis: Seeing in 2006 with the hottest black music in the mix. Txt us on 88111 [max cost 12p] or log on to bbc.co.uk/1xtra. At 2.00am - 1Xtra New Year Mix with Seani B.

Content.Title: 1Xtra New Year Mix: Seani B
Content.Synopsis: Seeing in 2006 with the hottest black music in the mix. Txt us on 88111 [max cost 12p] or log on to bbc.co.uk/1xtra. Coming up at 4.00am - 1Xtra New Year Mix with DJ B.

Content.Title: 1Xtra New Year Mix with DJ B
Content.Synopsis: Seeing in 2006 with the hottest black music in the mix. Txt us on 88111 [max cost 12p] or log on to bbc.co.uk/1xtra. Coming up at 6.00am - 1Xtra New Year Mix with Benji B.

Content.Title: 1Xtra New Year Mix with Benji B
Content.Synopsis: Seeing in 2006 with the hottest black music in the mix. Txt us on 88111 [max cost 12p] or log on to bbc.co.uk/1xtra. Coming up at 8.00am - 1Xtra New Year Mix with Aaron Ross.

Content.Title: 1Xtra New Year Mix: Aaron Ross
Content.Synopsis: Seeing in 2006 with the hottest black music in the mix. Txt us on 88111 [max cost 12p] or log on to bbc.co.uk/1xtra. Coming up at 10.00am - Nesha and Charlene White.

Content.Title: Nesha and Charlene White
Content.Synopsis: The morning after the night before! Tell us how you welcomed in the New Year. Txt us on 88111 [max cost 12p] or log on to bbc.co.uk/1xtra. Coming up at 2.00pm - Your Trax with Mistajam.

Content.Title: Your Trax with Mistajam
Content.Synopsis: Mistajam rinsing all the hottest black music tracks requested by you! Txt 88111 [max cost 12p] or log on to bbc.co.uk/1xtra. Coming up at 6.00pm - 100% Home Grown with Ras Kwame.

Content.Title: 100% Home Grown with Twin B
Content.Synopsis: Nothing but 100% UK music. The home of new talent is right here. Txt us on 88111 [max cost 12p], or log on to bbc.co.uk/1xtra. Coming up at 8.00pm - Heartless Crew.

Content.Title: The Heartless Crew
Content.Synopsis: Pure New Year Vibes - good times from HLC. Txt us on 88111 [max cost 12p] or log on to bbc.co.uk/1xtra. Coming up at 10.00pm - D&B: Intabeats with Bailey.

Content.Title: D&B: Intabeats with Bailey
Content.Synopsis: Upfront, exclusive drum & bass pressure. The weekend climaxes with fresh dub plate and unreleased selection. Txt us on 88111 [max cost 12p] or visit bbc.co.uk/1xtra. Coming up at midnight - 1Xtra Live
